name: Emperor of Solo Play
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: Betrayed by his guild and defeated by a top player, Hyrkan loses everything. Before he can get revenge, a fatal accident ends his life—only for him to wake up years in the past, back at the start of Warlord. Now, with his memories intact, he’s determined to rise to the top alone. But in a game where power means everything, can he truly survive without any allies? The Emperor of Solo Play is back, and this time, he’s playing by his own rules.Original Webtoon: Naver Webtoon, Naver Series Official
